original_title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Breeze from the Trees
overview: Three stories from the series The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That.  Follow along as The Cat in the Hat explores the world and helps others in the stories: Nest Best Thing, The Lost Egg, and The Tree Doctor.
title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Breeze from the Trees
